data.title: Wyoming Nonprofit Network
data.text:
The Align Team's mission is “creating strong communities by partnering with nonprofits, government and business for more impactful, successful organizations and programs.” Align offers special rates for training, facilitation, and consulting services to members as part of their Nonprofit Capacity Building Initiative. Align has extensive experience in nonprofit management and strategic planning.

Bloomerang helps nonprofits better manage all aspects of donor relationships. Bloomerang has pooled the latest best practices for fundraising, loyalty, engagement, and retention to create a simple 100% cloud-based donor database solution that helps nonprofits decrease donor attrition and increase revenue. Wyoming Nonprofit Network members save 10% on all first-year database service fees.

Through a partnership with BoardSource, members receive a 15% discount on single board standard organizational membership.

Delta Dental offers two great discounted plan options for our members.

Learn grantwriting from Grants Magic, online and at your own pace or with your team! The Ultimate Grant Proposal Blueprint: Your Step-By-Step Roadmap and Build-It-Yourself Toolkit for Crafting an A+ Proposal. 8-session self-paced online program. Enroll any time – start when you’re ready – go at your own pace. Members receive a $50 discount.

GrantStation offers the opportunity to identify potential funding sources for programs or projects as well as resources to mentor organizations through the grantseeking process. Through a subscription program, GrantStation provides access to a searchable database of private grantmakers; federal deadlines; links to state funding agencies; and a growing database of international grantmakers. Wyoming Nonprofit Network members can purchase a subscription through the Network for $95, a substantial savings from their regular price.

With background checks from IntelliCorp, you get comprehensive and validated screening services to help minimize risk and determine the quality of your new hires. Members receive special pricing options.

MindEdge Learning, a leader provider of online higher education and professional development, offers their suite of HR Management, Management and Nonprofit Management certificates and courses. These are on-demand, self-paced courses designed for adult-learners. These courses have been approved for CFRE, HRCI, SHRM and/or CEU credits. Members of the Wyoming Nonprofit Network receive a 10% discount.

Members save up to 75% off on office supplies at ODP Business Solutions (Office Depot/Office Max).

PeopleKeep offers hassle-free health reimbursement arrangement (HRAs) management enabling employers to administer their benefit in minutes per month at a low cost.
